name: Black White (Emanuele Feronato)
description:
Hyper Casual one button game.

Tap to jump and avoid enemies.

Gravity changes depending on the background color.

How far will you go?

------------------------------------------------------
TECH SPECS
------------------------------------------------------

Framework: Phaser 3.23.0

Physics engine: Arcade Physics

Lines of code: 257

------------------------------------------------------

Available for licensing or with completely explained source code. Learn to build your own game: www.emanueleferonato.com
